page.title: 18VISIT TO RAF LYNEHAM
page.content: WE WENT TO THE CAMP.WE WENT IN AN AIR-FORCE BUS AND WE STOPPED BY THE CAMP POST_OFFICE AND BANK.WE DREW THE POST_OFFICE AND WATER TANKS. WE WALKED UP TO AN OLD PLANE IT WAS SILVER AND QUITE SMALL.WE CAME TO THE HERCULES PLANES WE WALKED RIGHT UP TO ONE AND WENT IN THE COCKPIT. WE SAW A STRETCHED HERCULES IT WAS VERY BIG. WE ALSO SAW A HERCULES TAKING OFF, IT MADE A LOT OF NOISE.I ENJOYED OUR VISIT. SIAN GIBSON 7YRS. WE WENT TO THE CAMP WE SAW LOTS OF PLANES AND PILOTS. WE SAW THE BUILDINGS FOR THE DIFFERENT SQUADRONS.WE ALSO SAW A HERCULES THAT NEEDED REPAIRS. DANIELL DARWALL 7YRS.
